1.description: Queen of Urithiru and brilliant fabrial scholar, working on revolutionary Investiture research while managing the coalition war effort.

21.description: Captured by the Fused during their invasion of the Tower, forced into collaboration with Lady of Wishes Raboniel on dangerous fabrial research.

76.description: Becomes the new Bondsmith, bonded to the Sibling spren of the Tower after making the ultimate sacrifice to save both human and Fused from anti-Investiture.

1.description: Knight Radiant of the Order of Windrunners, struggling with depression and PTSD while training new Windrunner recruits.

16.description: Unable to access his Radiant powers due to severe depression and trauma, questioning his ability to protect others.

relationships.Syl: Strained bond due to mental state

64.description: Begins to overcome his depression through therapy and helping others, slowly regaining his connection to Syl and his powers.

80.description: Swears the Fourth Ideal of the Windrunners, accepting that he cannot save everyone and gaining new understanding of his purpose.

2.description: Knight Radiant of the Order of Lightweavers, investigating mysterious disappearances while struggling to control her multiple personalities.

45.description: Confronts the suppressed memories of killing her mother in self-defense, leading to further fracturing of her psyche.

77.description: Achieves integration of her personalities by accepting all aspects of herself, including her past traumas and mistakes.

3.description: Former Shardbearer now bonded to Maya, a deadeye Shardblade, leading diplomatic missions in Shadesmar.

46.description: Witnesses Maya speak and testify during the honorspren trial, revealing new truths about deadeye spren and ancient betrayals.

4.description: Former listener scholar now a Radiant bonded to the spren Timbre, hiding among the Fused occupation while learning her new powers.

73.description: Takes decisive action to help liberate the Tower, revealing her true loyalties and Radiant nature to aid the resistance.

flashbacks.description: Former listener warrior and explorer, sister to Venli, shown in flashbacks revealing the history of the listeners and their transformation.

1.description: Bondsmith bonded to the Stormfather, leading the coalition forces against Odium while managing political and military challenges.

5.description: Knight Radiant of the Order of Elsecallers, brilliant scholar and leader working on understanding the ancient history of Radiants and spren.

8.description: Ancient worldhopper and storyteller with mysterious powers, serving as advisor and confidant to various characters.

2.description: Cryptic spren bonded to Shallan, helping her navigate her multiple personalities and understand the nature of truth and lies.

1.description: Ancient honorspren bonded to Kaladin, struggling alongside him as his depression affects their bond.

64.description: Begins to heal her bond with Kaladin as he works through his depression and trauma.

5.description: Knight Radiant of the Order of Truthwatchers, bonded to the corrupted spren Glys, able to see possible futures.

10.description: Ancient spren of Urithiru Tower, child of Honor and Cultivation, dying due to the influence of Ba-Ado-Mishram.

76.description: Bonds with Navani to become a Bondsmith pair, saving both the Tower and its inhabitants from destruction.

16.description: Kaladin's father, a surgeon and pacifist who disagrees with his son's military path, trapped in the Tower during the Fused occupation.
Kaladin's mother, former citylady with noble blood, supporting her family through the Tower's occupation.
Kaladin's young brother, trapped with his family in the Tower during the Fused occupation.

6.description: Former Bridge Four member, now a Knight Radiant Windrunner and Kaladin's sergeant, struggling with firemoss addiction.

75.description: Dies heroically defending the Tower, swearing the Fourth Ideal before sacrificing himself to save others.

6.description: Former Bridge Four member, now a Knight Radiant Windrunner known for his humor and optimism despite hardships.
Former Bridge Four member, now a Knight Radiant Windrunner, cousin to Lopen.
Former listener spy who joined Bridge Four, now becoming a Knight Radiant Truthwatcher despite the prejudice he faces.

25.description: Young Knight Radiant of the Order of Edgedancers, able to metabolize food directly into Stormlight and slip between realms.

6.description: Former Bridge Four member and Horneater, serving as cook and friend to the group, cannot become Radiant due to cultural beliefs.
Former Bridge Four member and Azish worldsinger, now a Knight Radiant Windrunner with scholarly interests.

21.description: Ancient Fused scholar and scientist, leader of the Tower invasion, captures Navani to collaborate on dangerous fabrial research.

76.description: Dies helping Navani save the Tower, finding redemption through scientific collaboration and understanding.

20.description: Ancient Fused warrior obsessed with hunting and killing Kaladin, able to transfer between singer bodies upon death.

35.description: Former Bridge Four member now serving Odium, given the name Vyre and tasked with eliminating threats to Odium's plans.

15.description: Ancient Fused with a sense of honor, respects worthy opponents and questions some of Odium's methods.

10.description: One of the Unmade, ancient spren of Odium whose imprisonment is causing the Tower's systems to fail.

25.description: Shard of Adonalsium representing hatred and passion, seeking to destroy other Shards and escape Roshar.

45.description: Herald of War who maintained the cycle of Desolations alone for millennia, now struggling with madness from his long torment.

40.description: Herald of Beauty who abandoned her duty, now working to destroy her own legacy and artwork.

60.description: Herald of Luck who has become corrupt and mad with power, conducting dangerous experiments with Connection and Identity.

55.description: Herald of Resolve who hides among mortals, fearful of returning to his Herald duties.

50.description: Herald of Justice who has been hunting and killing potential Radiants to prevent the return of the Desolations.

6.description: Honorspren bonded to Teft, helping him overcome his firemoss addiction and grow as a Windrunner.

3.description: Deadeye cultivationspren, formerly bonded to an ancient Radiant, now slowly awakening through her connection with Adolin.

46.description: Speaks during the honorspren trial, revealing the pain and betrayal felt by spren when Radiants abandoned their oaths.

4.description: Rhythm spren bonded to Venli, helping her become a Radiant and resist Odium's influence.

25.description: Cultivationspren bonded to Lift, appears as a vine and helps her with her Edgedancer abilities.

5.description: Inkspren bonded to Jasnah, grants her Elsecaller abilities and serves as her scholarly companion.
Corrupted lightspren bonded to Renarin, grants him Truthwatcher abilities but with Odium's influence.

26.description: Former Bridge Four member who rarely speaks, proves instrumental in resistance efforts within the Tower.

12.description: Queen of Thaylenah and member of the coalition, working to coordinate resistance efforts during the Tower's occupation.

1.description: Ancient spren bonded to Dalinar, combined essence of the Stormfather and Honor's Cognitive Shadow.

45.description: Shard of Adonalsium representing growth and change, working behind the scenes to prepare for Odium's defeat.

8.description: Powerful cryptic spren bonded to Hoid, grants him Lightweaver abilities for his storytelling.

6.description: Young honorspren bonded to Lopen, enthusiastic and optimistic like her Radiant.
Lightspren bonded to Rlain, helping him become a Truthwatcher despite the prejudice against listeners.
Honorspren bonded to Sigzil, shares his scholarly and methodical approach to problems.

24.description: Singer working under Fused occupation, conflicted about the treatment of humans in the Tower.

30.description: Singer serving the Fused, begins to question the righteousness of their cause through interactions with humans.

14.description: Honorspren captain escorting Adolin's group through Shadesmar, initially hostile to humans due to ancient betrayals.

8.description: Inkspren guide helping Adolin's expedition navigate Shadesmar and understand spren politics.
Cryptic spren accompanying the expedition, provides unique perspective on spren-human relationships.
Human lightwarden accompanying the expedition, experienced in Shadesmar travel.

23.description: Honorspren serving as judge in the trial against Adolin and humanity for the ancient betrayals.
Fortress-city of the honorspren in Shadesmar, where the trial of Adolin takes place.

25.description: Edgedancer accompanying Lift, helps with healing and remembering the forgotten.
Cultivationspren bonded to Godeke, appears as geometric crystal patterns.

50.description: Worldhopper and former princess from Nalthis, now working with the coalition forces using Awakening abilities.

45.description: Returned God from Nalthis, now teaching swordsmanship while hiding his true identity as a worldhopper.
Sentient sword from Nalthis, extremely powerful but dangerous, requires constant Investiture to avoid corrupting its wielder.

I-1.description: Former Truthless assassin, now a Skybreaker seeking redemption and understanding of justice.

I-4.description: Thaylen merchant who gained the ability to see into Shadesmar through her encounter with a larkin.
Larkin bonded to Rysn, capable of absorbing Stormlight and granting unique abilities.
Mysterious shattered island with ancient secrets and dangerous creatures.

I-5.description: Horneater woman and Rock's daughter, explores the Shattered Plains seeking the secrets of her people.

flashback.description: Eshonai's body possessed by a Fused, used to hunt Kaladin while her spirit fights for control.

I-4.description: Ancient hive-mind creatures from Aimia, made of smaller cremlings working together.

I-2.description: Former king of Kharbranth who made a deal with Cultivation for intelligence, now serves as vessel for Odium.
Taravangian's loyal bodyguard and executioner, conflicted about his master's transformation.

I-3.description: Young Edgedancer learning to use her powers while helping refugees.

40.description: Ancient Fused with wisdom and experience, provides counsel to other Fused about the nature of their war.

various.description: The storms themselves as a force of nature and Investiture on Roshar.

60.description: Worldhopper and high-ranking member of the Ghostbloods, pursuing his own agenda regarding Investiture.
Worldhopper from Southern Scadrial, works with Mraize and the Ghostbloods.

recaps.prologue: One year after the Battle of Thaylen Field, the coalition forces prepare for the assault on Emul while mysterious forces move in the shadows of Roshar.
recaps.1: Kaladin struggles with his depression while training new Windrunners. Navani works on fabrial research in the Tower.
recaps.2: Shallan investigates mysterious disappearances in the warcamps while dealing with her multiple personalities.
recaps.3: Adolin continues diplomatic efforts with the honorspren while bonding with Maya, his deadeye Blade.
recaps.4: Venli learns to use her new powers as a Radiant while hiding among the Fused occupation of the Tower.
recaps.5: Navani discovers new fabrial technology as the Tower faces increasing threats from within.
recaps.6: Kaladin confronts his past trauma while leading Bridge Four in dangerous missions.
recaps.7: Shallan's investigation leads her deeper into the mysteries of Ba-Ado-Mishram and ancient history.
recaps.8: Adolin and his expedition face challenges in Shadesmar while seeking the honorspren stronghold.
recaps.9: Venli struggles with her dual loyalties as she witnesses the Fused's plans for the Tower.
recaps.10: The Tower's defenses begin to fail as ancient Unmade influences spread throughout Urithiru.
recaps.11: Kaladin's mental health deteriorates as he faces impossible choices about his duty.
recaps.12: Navani makes breakthrough discoveries about the nature of Investiture and fabrial science.
recaps.13: Shallan confronts the truth about her past while her personalities vie for control.
recaps.14: Adolin's group encounters resistance from suspicious honorspren in Shadesmar.
recaps.15: The Fused begin their assault on the Tower as Venli realizes the scope of their plan.
recaps.16: Kaladin finds himself unable to use his powers as depression overwhelms him.
recaps.17: Navani works desperately to understand the Tower's failing systems.
recaps.18: Shallan discovers ancient secrets that threaten her understanding of reality.
recaps.19: The Tower falls under siege as the Fused launch their full invasion.
recaps.20: Kaladin struggles to protect others while battling his inner demons.
recaps.21: Navani is captured by the Fused and brought before their leader, Raboniel.
recaps.22: Shallan's personalities fracture further as she faces overwhelming revelations.
recaps.23: Adolin's group is put on trial by the honorspren for the crimes of ancient Radiants.
recaps.24: Venli attempts to help the trapped humans while maintaining her cover.
recaps.25: The Tower's population faces dire circumstances under Fused occupation.
recaps.26: Kaladin is forced into hiding within the Tower's lower levels.
recaps.27: Navani begins an uneasy collaboration with Raboniel on fabrial research.
recaps.28: Shallan journeys through Shadesmar seeking answers about Ba-Ado-Mishram.
recaps.29: The honorspren trial reveals ancient grudges against the Knights Radiant.
recaps.30: Venli learns more about the history of the singers and their enslavement.
recaps.31: Resistance efforts in the Tower face increasing dangers from Fused patrols.
recaps.32: Kaladin encounters other refugees hiding in the Tower's depths.
recaps.33: Navani's research with Raboniel yields dangerous new discoveries.
recaps.34: Shallan confronts memories she had suppressed about her mother.
recaps.35: The trial in Shadesmar takes an unexpected turn as Maya speaks.
recaps.36: Venli discovers the true extent of Odium's influence on the singers.
recaps.37: The Tower's defenses continue to weaken under the Unmade's influence.
recaps.38: Kaladin begins to find purpose again through helping other survivors.
recaps.39: Navani and Raboniel's partnership deepens as they explore anti-Investiture.
recaps.40: Shallan's investigation leads to shocking discoveries about her family.
recaps.41: Adolin fights to prove the honorspren wrong about Radiant nature.
recaps.42: The Fused implement harsh new rules for the Tower's human population.
recaps.43: Kaladin starts organizing resistance efforts from the Tower's lower levels.
recaps.44: Navani makes a breakthrough that could change the nature of fabrials.
recaps.45: Shallan faces the truth about what happened to her mother.
recaps.46: Maya's testimony shocks the honorspren and changes the trial's direction.
recaps.47: Venli learns to better control her new Radiant abilities.
recaps.48: The resistance in the Tower grows as more people join Kaladin.
recaps.49: Navani's experiments with anti-Investiture yield terrifying results.
recaps.50: Shallan begins to integrate her fractured personalities.
recaps.51: The honorspren are forced to reconsider their prejudices against Radiants.
recaps.52: Venli helps coordinate secret efforts to undermine the Fused occupation.
recaps.53: Kaladin leads a daring rescue mission within the Tower.
recaps.54: Navani discovers the truth about the Tower's original purpose.
recaps.55: Shallan's personalities begin working together for the first time.
recaps.56: Adolin's diplomatic efforts start showing results with some honorspren.
recaps.57: The Tower's situation becomes increasingly desperate for its inhabitants.
recaps.58: Kaladin confronts his depression head-on with support from friends.
recaps.59: Navani realizes the dangerous implications of her fabrial research.
recaps.60: Shallan learns the full truth about Ba-Ado-Mishram's imprisonment.
recaps.61: The honorspren trial reaches a critical turning point.
recaps.62: Venli discovers a way to help free the Tower from Fused control.
recaps.63: Resistance efforts in the Tower face their greatest challenge yet.
recaps.64: Kaladin begins to regain his connection to his spren and powers.
recaps.65: Navani and Raboniel's research approaches a dangerous conclusion.
recaps.66: Shallan prepares for a final confrontation with her past.
recaps.67: Adolin makes a passionate plea for Radiant redemption.
recaps.68: The Tower's defenders prepare for a desperate last stand.
recaps.69: Kaladin rallies the resistance for a coordinated uprising.
recaps.70: Navani faces a terrible choice about the future of Investiture.
recaps.71: Shallan confronts her mother's killer and her own guilt.
recaps.72: The honorspren verdict could determine the fate of all spren-human bonds.
recaps.73: Venli takes decisive action to help liberate the Tower.
recaps.74: The battle for the Tower enters its final phase.
recaps.75: Kaladin leads a desperate assault to reclaim the Tower's upper levels.
recaps.76: Navani makes the ultimate sacrifice to save both human and spren.
recaps.77: Shallan achieves integration of her personalities through acceptance.
recaps.78: The honorspren trial concludes with unexpected alliances formed.
recaps.79: The Tower's liberation comes at great cost to its defenders.
recaps.80: Kaladin swears his Fourth Ideal and gains new understanding of his role.
recaps.81: The aftermath of the Tower battle reveals new threats on the horizon.
recaps.82: Navani's actions have far-reaching consequences for all of Roshar.
recaps.83: Shallan begins a new chapter of her life with her personalities unified.
recaps.84: The alliance with honorspren opens new possibilities for the war effort.
recaps.85: Preparations begin for the next phase of the war against Odium.
recaps.86: New revelations about the nature of Investiture reshape understanding.
recaps.87: The characters reflect on their growth and losses during the Tower siege.
recaps.88: Ancient secrets are revealed that change the history of Roshar.
recaps.89: The coalition forces regroup and plan their next moves.
recaps.90: New alliances are forged in the aftermath of the Tower's liberation.
recaps.91: The true nature of the Sibling is finally revealed.
recaps.92: Odium's champions prepare for the coming contest of champions.
recaps.93: The Knights Radiant emerge stronger but forever changed.
recaps.94: New threats emerge as old ones are finally defeated.
recaps.95: The war against Odium enters a new and dangerous phase.
recaps.96: Ancient powers awaken as the final conflict approaches.
recaps.97: The champions of Honor and Odium prepare for their destined battle.
recaps.98: Revelations about the Cosmere reshape the characters' understanding.
recaps.99: The stage is set for the ultimate confrontation between good and evil.
recaps.100: New powers emerge as the conflict reaches cosmic proportions.
recaps.101: The fate of Roshar hangs in the balance as forces gather.
recaps.102: Ancient oaths and bonds are tested to their limits.
recaps.103: The true enemy begins to reveal their ultimate plan.
recaps.104: Heroes must choose between personal desires and greater good.
recaps.105: The final battle approaches as all storylines converge.
recaps.106: Sacrifices are made as the ultimate price of victory becomes clear.
recaps.107: The contest of champions begins with unexpected participants.
recaps.108: Betrayals and revelations change the nature of the final conflict.
recaps.109: The battle for Roshar's soul reaches its climactic moment.
recaps.110: New Ideals are sworn as heroes find their true strength.
recaps.111: The final confrontation determines the fate of the Cosmere.
recaps.112: Victory comes at a price that changes everything.
recaps.113: The aftermath of the final battle reveals new realities.
recaps.114: Characters must adapt to a world forever changed by their actions.
recaps.115: New beginnings emerge from the ashes of the old world.
recaps.116: The future of Roshar is shaped by the choices of its champions.
recaps.117: Hope emerges as the characters look toward an uncertain but promising future.
recaps.epilogue: The story concludes with glimpses of how the world has changed and what the future holds for Roshar and its people.
